remarks: Sufficient condition to ensure a sequence of nested balls is Cauchy. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
statement:
caubl.2 $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
caubl.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> ( X X. RR+ ) ) $.
caubl.4 $e |- ( ph -> A. n e. NN ( ( ball ` D ) ` ( F ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) C_ ( ( ball ` D ) ` ( F ` n ) ) ) $.
caubl.5 $e |- ( ph -> A. r e. RR+ E. n e. NN ( 2nd ` ( F ` n ) ) < r ) $.
caubl $p |- ( ph -> ( 1st o. F ) e. ( Cau ` D ) ) $.
$d D n r $.
$d F n r $.
$d X n r $.
$d n ph r $.
